quest.name: Dastardly Diremites
journal: Agujam is worried by what lurks beneath the sands.
objectives: Slay any diremites that appear in the rocky area to the west.

dialogue.name: AGUJAM
dialogue.text: Do these foul creatures not rest!?

dialogue.name: AGUJAM
dialogue.text: Ah, you there, adventurer. Should you be willing, I would like your help with something.

dialogue.name: AGUJAM
dialogue.text: I have sighted an unusually large number of diremites in the area of late. They always appear after sandstorms. This would not be a problem if they fought fairly. However, they choose to cower beneath the sands, waiting to strike when you are vulnerable.

dialogue.name: AGUJAM
dialogue.text: Slay any that you find by the rocky area to the west and I shall see you are rewarded suitably. You have my word.

dialogue.name: AGUJAM
dialogue.text: Slay any that you find by the rocky area to the west and I shall see you are rewarded suitably. You have my word.

dialogue.name: AGUJAM
dialogue.text: The beasts have been slain? You have my thanks.

dialogue.name: AGUJAM
dialogue.text: If the diremites only attacked warriors such as ourselves, this would not have been such a problem. But they will prey on anyone. Women, children, it matters not to them.

dialogue.name: AGUJAM
dialogue.text: I will not stand for this. We must not rest until they have been eradicated from the area.

dialogue.name: AGUJAM
dialogue.text: Thank you for helping me to dispatch the first few of them. We will take care of the rest.
